name: (Tech Demo) Basic Zombie FPS
description:
Fullscreen button is available in the bottom right. This is a very large game for the browser, so it may take some time to initially load. You may also see some delay once you hit the "Start" button.

==============================================

I don't actually recommend playing this game for fun, it was a project I created for learning based on the Gamedev.tv Unity3D course. I'm uploading it mostly for self-reference and so other students can see how it works. Because it is a learning project there are many bugs and things that could be polished more (but aren't worth it for a practice program).

This is a Zombie FPS game so it's a bit scary. 

Github: https://github.com/JemWritesCode/ZombieRunner
